CustomField.description: The user populates this picklist to indicate Home Lending compliance calculations are required for the loan. Examples of compliance calculations specific to U.S. Home Lending are Regulation Z and HOEPA High-Cost Mortgage and Higher-Priced Mortgage Loan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates if loans originated for this product require Home Lending compliance calculations.
CustomField.label: Home Lending Compliance Calculations
